roleExtraction.prompt:
Extract 5-8 key roles from this project description: {{projectDescription}}

Respond with only a JSON array of role names (strings), no additional text.

raciAdvice.prompt:
For the task '{{task}}' in a {{projectType}} project with roles {{roles}}, suggest the most appropriate RACI assignment.

Respond with only a JSON object mapping role names to RACI values (R, A, C, or I). Ensure exactly one A (Accountable).
